mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Payment(merchantUid, userIdx, storeIdx,couponIdx, payMethod, userPaymentIdx, impUid ,amount,name,point,refundStatus,modiBy,modiRole) VALUES(#{merchantUid},#{userIdx},#{storeIdx},#{couponIdx},#{payMethod},#{userPaymentIdx},#{impUid},#{amount},#{name},#{point},#{refundStatus},#{modiBy},#{modiRole}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE refundStatus=#{refundStatus}, modiBy=#{modiBy}, modiRole=#{modiRole}
mapper.update: UPDATE Payment SET refundReason=#{refundReason}, refundHolder=#{refundHolder}, refundBank=#{refundBank}, refundAccount=#{refundAccount}, refundStatus=#{refundStatus}, modiBy=#{modiBy}, modiRole=#{modiRole} WHERE merchantUid=#{merchantUid}
UPDATE Payment SET cancelAmount=#{cancelAmount}, refundStatus=#{refundStatus}, modiBy=#{modiBy}, modiRole=#{modiRole} WHERE merchantUid=#{merchantUid}
mapper.select: SELECT p.merchantUid, p.refundReason, u.userName, u.userPhoneNumber, r.reservationIdx, date_format(r.reservationTime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i") as reservationTime, r.selectedHall, r.useTime, r.personCount, (case when r.createdAt is null then 0 else 1 end) as isPaid, (case when r.reservePrice is null then 0 else r.reservePrice end) as amount, (case when p.refundStatus = 1 then '환불 요청 중' when p.refundStatus = 2 then '환불 완료' end) as refundStatus FROM Payment p left join Users u on p.userIdx = u.userIdx left join Reservations r on r.merchantUid = p.merchantUid WHERE p.storeIdx = #{storeIdx} and (refundStatus = 1 or refundStatus = 2) ORDER BY p.refundStatus, r.reservationTime
